ygData.subject: RE: Bard quests
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Gypsy Lute MAGIC ITEM LORE ITEM NO DROP WT: 0.5 SV MAGIC: +5 It comes from the gypsy musicians in the Piano Room of Castle Mistmoore.  Hope that helps!
ygData.messageBody:
>Can you confirm what lute is needed for the breast plate?
>I spent all my money buying a Lute of the Gypsy Princess
>for 200P and now hear that there is a no drop lute that
>comes from the same spot. I just cant seem to win.

Gypsy Lute
MAGIC ITEM LORE ITEM NO DROP
WT: 0.5
SV MAGIC: +5


It comes from the gypsy musicians in the Piano Room of
Castle Mistmoore. Hope that helps!

Harmonic Distortion, 40th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
